caption.p: Effect of oral administration of (-)-fenchone and loperamide on gastric emptying in male Swiss mice. Data expressed as mean Â± standard deviation and analyzed by ANOVA, followed by Dunnet and Tukey's multiple comparison tests ( b P < 0.01 and e P < 0.001, compared to the 5% tween 80 group) ( n = 7/per group).
